snippet.title: Assassin Blue - Levels 1-3
snippet.description:
A spoiler-free playthrough of the first 3 levels of my action/platformer game in progress, Assassin Blue.

I couldn't record the actual audio, so I put mp3 versions of the game music over the video instead.  The backgrounds didn't record perfectly but they're mostly good.

You can play the game here:
http://www.yoyogames.com/games/show/44391
It was made with Game Maker 7.0 Pro Edition.
